section.title: Brief history
section.p: Historically, monograms are rooted in currency (coins) for city names, royalty and family insignia, etc. Currently, monograms are popular in technology, fashion, and chain industries. In short, people, companies, and organizations who use monograms are deemed as "chest puffing."
